com.vub.service

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vub.service.UserService

  • @Service(value="userService")
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides services regarding users. These include CRUD operations, but also hashing the password, activating, etc.
    Author:
    Sam

public User createUser(User user)

      • hashPassword

        public void hashPassword(User user)
        Hash the password field in the User object Does not save the changes to the database.
        Parameters:
        user - User who needs his password hashed

      • activateUser

        public void activateUser(User user,
                Key key)
                  throws CannotActivateUserException
        Change the state of the user to activated. Does not save the changes to the database.
        Parameters:
        user - User one wishes to activate
        Throws:
        CannotActivateUserException - Throws exception when the key is not of the activation type (and thus cannot be used)

      • findUserByID

        @Transactional
public User findUserByID(int id)
                  throws UserNotFoundException
        Finds the user with a given ID
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the user you want to find
        Returns:
        Returns the User with the given ID
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - When the user with the given ID cannot be found

      • findUserByUsername

        @Transactional
public User findUserByUsername(java.lang.String username)
                        throws UserNotFoundException
        Find a user with a given username
        Parameters:
        username - Username of the user which needs to be found
        Returns:
        Returns the user with the associated username
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - When the user with the given username cannot be found

      • findUserByEmail

        @Transactional
public User findUserByEmail(java.lang.String email)
                     throws UserNotFoundException
        Find a user with a given e-mail address
        Parameters:
        email - The e-mail address which belongs to the user you want to find
        Returns:
        Returns the user
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - When the user with the given e-mail cannot be found

      • assignUserRole

        @Transactional
public void assignUserRole(User user,
                                UserRole.UserRoleEnum role)
        Assign a new role to a specified user. Creates a new UserRole in database if it does not exist yet, otherwise the existing database entry will be used. Will not persist user to database when assigning new role.
        Parameters:
        user - User to assign a new role to
        role - New role to assign to the user.
